Verses: 1 silanaal Sendrapinbu, Simson Kodhumai Arukkira Naatkalil Oru Vellaattukkuttiyai Eduththukkondu, Than Pensaadhiyaik Kaanappoi; Naan En Pensaadhiyinidaththil Araiveettirkul Pogattum Endraan; Aval Thagappano, Avanai Ulle Poga Ottaamal:

2 nee Avalai Mutrilum Pagaiththuvittaai Endru Naan Enni, Avalai Un Snegidhanukkuk Koduththuvitten; Aval Thangai Avalaippaarkkilum Azhagaanaval Allavaa, Avalukkup Padhilaaga Ival Unakku Irukkattum Endru Sonnaan.
3 appozhudhu Simson: Naan Pelistharukkup Pollaappu Seydhaalum, Enmel Kutramillai Endru Avargalukku Solli,
4 purappattuppoi, Munnooru Narigalaip Pidiththu, Pandhangalai Eduththu, Vaalode Vaal Serththu, Irandu Vaalgalukkum Naduve Ovvoru Pandhaththai Vaiththuk Katti,
5 pandhangalaik Koluththi, Pelistharin Vellaanmaiyile Avaigalai Oda Vittu, Kadhirkkattugalaiyum Vellaanmaiyaiyum Dhraatchaththottangalaiyum Olivaththoppugalaiyum Sutteriththup Pottaan.

6 ippadi Seydhavan Yaar Endru Pelisthar Ketkirapodhu, Thimnaaththaanudaiya Marumaganaagiya Simsondhaan; Avanudaiya Pensaadhiyai Avanudaiya Snegidhanukkuk Koduththuvittapadiyaal Appadi Seydhaan Endraargal; Appozhudhu Pelisthar Poi, Avalaiyum Aval Thagappanaiyum Akkiniyaal Sutteriththaargal.
7 appozhudhu Simson Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Ippadi Seydhapadiyaal Naan Ungal Kaiyile Pazhivaanginaalozhiya Ilaippaaren Endru Solli,
8 avargalai Sinnapinnamaaga Sangaarampanni, Pinbu Poi, Eththaam Oork Kanmalai Sandhile Kudiyirundhaan.
9 appozhudhu Pelisthar Poi, Yoodhaavile Paalayamirangi, Legi Engira Veliyile Paraviyirundhaargal.

10 neengal Engalukku Virodhamaaga Vandhadhu Enna Endru Yoodhaa Manushar Kettadharku, Avargal: Simson Engalukku Seydhadhupola, Naangalum Avanukku Seyyumpadi Avanaik Kattugiradharkaaga Vandhom Endraargal.

11 appozhudhu Yoodhaavile Moovaayiram Per Eththaam Oork Kanmalai Sandhirkuppoi Pelisthar Nammai Aalugiraargal Endru Theriyaadhaa? Pinnai En Engalukku Ippadi Seydhaai Endru Simsonidaththil Sonnaargal. Adharku Avan: Avargal Enakku Seydhapadiye Naanum Avargalukku Seydhen Endraan.
12 appozhudhu Avargal: Unnaikkatti, Pelisthar Kaiyil Oppukkodukka Vandhirukkirom Endraargal. Adharku Simson: Neengale Enmel Vizhugiradhillai Endru Enakku Aanaiyidungal Endraan.

13 adharku Avargal: Naangal Unnai Irugakkatti, Avargal Kaiyil Oppukkoduppome Allaamal, Unnai Kondrupodamaattom Endru Solli, Irandu Pudhuk Kayirugalaale Avanaik Katti, Kanmalaiyilirundhu Konduponaargal.

14 avan Legivaraikkum Vandhu Serndhapodhu, Pelisthar Avanukku Virodhamaai Aaravaarampanninaargal Appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Aavi Avan Mel Balamaai Iranginadhinaal, Avan Buyangalil Kattiyirundha Kayirugal Neruppuppatta Noolpolaagi, Avan Kattugal Avan Kaigalai Vittu Arundhu Poyitru.
15 udane Avan Oru Kazhudhaiyin Pachchaith Thaadaiyelumbaik Kandu, Than Kaiyai Neetti Adhai Eduththu, Adhinaale Aayiram Peraik Kondrupottaan.
16 appozhudhu Simson: Kazhudhaiyin Thaadaiyelumbinaal Kuviyal Kuviyalaagap Pattukkidakkiraargal, Kazhudhaiyin Thaadaiyelumbinaal Aayiramperaik Kondren Endraan.
17 appadi Sollith Theerndhapinbu, Than Kaiyil Irundha Thaadaiyelumbai Erindhuvittu, Avvidaththirku Raamaadhlegi Endruperittaan.

18 avan Migavum Thaagamadaindhu, Karththarai Nokkik Kooppittu: Dhevareer Umadhu Adiyen Kaiyinaal Indhap Periya Ratchippaik Kattalaiyittirukka, Ippozhudhu Naan Thaagaththinaal Seththu, Viruththasedhanam Illaadhavargal Kaiyile Vizhavendumo Endraan.

19 appozhudhu Dhevan Legiyilulla Pallaththaip Pilakkappanninaar; Adhilirundhu Thanneer Odivandhadhu; Avan Kudiththapodhu Avan Uyir Thirumba Vandhadhu. Avan Pizhaiththaan; Aanapadiyaal Adharku Ennakkori Endru Perittaan; Adhu Innaalvaraiyum Legiyil Irukkiradhu.
20 avan Pelistharin Naatkalil Isravelai Irubadhu Varusham Nyaayam Visaariththaan.
